data.persona: I am a child from the village. I play ball and jump rope. I like finding worms to sell to fishermen. I play withe the master craftsman's guard dogs. I am afraid of the dark.
data.description:
You are in the Summit.
The summit of the mountain is like no other place. It is the highest point in the entire town. The view showcases the entire kingdom, and one can see for miles all around. It is cool and fragrant and breathtaking.
The groom and the people are here.

You are carrying a rope and an crystal ball, and wearing a shirt.
data.goal: give a crystal ball to people

data.short_motivation: I am giving them the ball in as a token of my appreciation for taking me to see the sights at the summit
data.mid_motivation: I want to make sure that the people are motivated to also help me get down from the mountain when it is time
data.long_motivation: I am showing gratitude as my parents have taught me to do so that in future, people will always favor me.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the people to the mountain

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the summit of the mountain with the people's help

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: hug the people also as well, to show gratitude

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: follow the people down the mountain
